solution_line_template: If he finished the race, it would've taken {diego_full_block_time} minutes because {diego_half_block_time} x {diego_full_block_multiplier} = <<{diego_half_block_time}*{diego_full_block_multiplier}={diego_full_block_time}>>{diego_full_block_time}
Their total time would've been {total_time} minutes because {carlos_full_block_time} + {diego_full_block_time} = <<{carlos_full_block_time}+{diego_full_block_time}={total_time}>>{total_time}
The average would've been {average_time_minutes} minutes because {total_time} / {num_racers} = <<{total_time}/{num_racers}={average_time_minutes}>>{average_time_minutes}

The average time in seconds would've been {average_time_seconds} because {average_time_minutes} x {seconds_per_minute} = <<{average_time_minutes}*{seconds_per_minute}={average_time_seconds}>>{average_time_seconds}
